text: Charles Tahan (born June 11, 1998) is an American actor. His notable television roles include Wyatt Langmore in the Netflix crime drama Ozark (2017–2022), Ben Burke in the Fox dystopian mystery thriller Wayward Pines (2015–2016) and the young Jonathan Crane / Scarecrow in the Fox/DC Comics superhero drama Gotham (2014–2017). His movie credits include Charlie St. Cloud (2010), Frankenweenie (2012) and Blue Jasmine (2013). ==Life== Tahan was born in Glen Rock, New Jersey. His sister is actress Daisy Tahan. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from New Jersey Category:American child actors Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors
title: Charlie Tahan
